website_summaries.verdict: This is an adequate convection oven with a wide array of functions.
pros: Owners enjoy everything from toasting to specialized “Asado roasting.” Accommodates larger dishes
cons: Dials and knobs can be confusing
There are some complaints about its ability to maintain a consistent temperature

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok being used once every few weeks for a year. Making toast required several cycles though. The bigger problem is that the electronics broke completely after owning it 15 months; the timer counts down at 6x speed and an ERR message flashes with a loud incessant beep. So it's going to the curb...$230 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: DaveP

customer_reviews.title: Often, does not get to preheated temperature that is chosen.  Occasionally shuts off randomly
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 of these over about 2 years, and they all do the same thing. (KitchenAid replaced the unit, hoping the new one worked better, but it didn’t). They all had the same problem. Often, the oven NEVER seems to get to the preheated temperature, when I set it above 400 degrees. (Even when waiting >15-20 minutes) . Finally get tired of waiting, and put the food in, and it goes the entire cook time (another 15-20 minutes and continues to just blink “preheating”. Also, all 3 units on occasion seem to turn off at random times, well before the food was supposed to be done. I would NOT recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: florida1

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product - BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product for the first 2 months after I purchased it; however, for the past 6 to 8 weeks, it's become practically unusable. It turns itself off randomly, it won't hold a temperature, and it frequently emits an ear piercing tone, which does not stop unless I unplug it. The unit I was provided clearly has a mechanical defect and I'm getting nowhere with KitchenAid to get it replaced. And I'm told it's too late to exchange it through Amazon. BEWARE OF THIS PRODUCT! Complete rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fanny Robin

customer_reviews.title: The best convention oven
customer_reviews.text: Finally just what I was looking for. I’ve baked pies, pizza, chicken and more, everything came out great. I was so sleepy trying to finish my thanksgiving prep that I wasn’t sure if I can stay awake to finish the pie. Nobody was willing to stay up and turn the oven off. I remember I could bake it in my KitchenAid and it will automatically turn off. I put in my pie and went to sleep. It turned out beautiful. I couldn’t be happier. I tried 3 other products before this one.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic oven for small things. I recently moved into an apartment, and the kitchen needs a full renovation. This is a temporary solution to a non-working oven! It sits on my counter top, and doesn't take up much space. I bake chicken and fish, roast veggies,even bake eggs. I was expecting small, so was happily surprised that my 10" Le Creuset fits nicely. I plan small things and have never had an issue - could easily even roast a small turkey. I read other reviews before buying this and avoided those that talked about shattering glass, etc... I've had this for about a month and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Faxon

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully-designed, but faulty timers make these ovens useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these beautifully-designed ovens less than one year ago. Already two of the timers have failed: one started counting time at an accelerated rate (speeded up by about 3 times) and the the other stopped the countdown completely before showing gibberish on the screen after an unplug and plug in (see photo). Also, these were purchased from Amazon.com and shipped by the vendor to Puerto Rico with no mention that the Kitchenaid warranty does not apply in Puerto Rico. Kitchenaid would not send a replacement unit to the island.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Edward

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!  3rd time's a charm
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on which convection oven I wanted. Started with Cuisinart but had all kinds of issues right out of the box. Returned. Then, Breville. Same deals - lots of little quirks, and inconsistent temps. Returned. #3 - Bought the KitchenAid and it is PERFECT. Absolutely no complaints. It does everything I wanted and more and could not be easier to operate. Beautiful modern design - ties right in with our stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A challenge finding cooking trays to fit, needs 11 1/2 inches wide or less. But for a person who cooks for two and does not want to heat up the house in the summer to cook a pizza or a casserole this is the ticket. I've made meatloaf, baked chicken, biscuits and casseroles - all with happy results. Needed something what wouldn't dominate the countertop. I can open the oven's door and it does not hang over the counter excessively. Made certain there was plenty to space for air circulation. Does not give off a scary amount of heat while working.
customer_reviews.author: MEMCGT

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Worked great then it just died. The disk to choose different functions will not work any longer. We've only had it for about 2 years. You expect something this expensive to last longer. We've taken it apart but there is no way time fix it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nation

customer_reviews.title: Off to the Landfill
customer_reviews.text: The first unit was DOA. The replacement unit was flaky (coils didn't heat correctly, display was flashing when it shouldn't) but I was tired of dealing with it. I decided to stick it out but the heating has always been uneven and the display shorted out). Now after 2 years, the replacement unit has completely died. I regret giving this a second chance and not applying my credit for the first unit to an entirely different make and model.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Barker

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting; problems at higher temps
customer_reviews.text: Not great for toasting, very uneven, though baking temps do seem pretty even. Temp about 30° lower than the thermostat says, and the thermostat only goes up to 450° so higher-heat cooking doesn't work well. Seems like trying to bypass the preheat at higher temps causes problems. I like the bagel setting, higher toasting heat on the top than on the bottom—useful for burger buns too.
customer_reviews.author: Read

customer_reviews.title: Look. Ma.  Its a KitchenAid!
customer_reviews.text: We;ve used this oven for a couple of months. It was purchased beause it matches our other KitchenAid kitchen appliances, not because our 8 year old KitchenAid oven had a problem: it did not. This new oven works better and is easier to use. Setting the cooking temp and time is a breeze. The food comes out right every time. I have only one criticism. The outer casing needs more insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Micha R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I will start out by saying I absolutely love this toaster oven. It is very simple to use and cooks a great pizza. Toast comes out close to perfect, which is something a didn't believe a toaster oven could do. It looks beautiful. My only negative is that this is my second one. The first one worked only one time before the digital read out messed up and I couldn't see what actual temperature the oven was on or number of slices of toast. I returned it to Amazon and received another one. Hopefully this one will have some longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Nixon72

customer_reviews.title: ... know how to say that this is the most wonderful product I have purchased in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to say that this is the most wonderful product I have purchased in a long time. I think we are so used to getting the "short end of the stick" after a purchase that most don't complain. I did not want to buy a new stove so I viewed this as my only choice. Oh, was I so pleased. It does everything, as cooking for one person, could want. It is just wonderful. Thank you Kitchen Aid.
customer_reviews.author: seacrest

customer_reviews.title: Great, but toasts unevenly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 2-3 months, and it does the job. Our oven broke, so we’ve been using this toaster oven in its place. It would get 5 stars if it toasted evenly. The back side cooks faster than the front, so I have to rotate the dish frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Foster

customer_reviews.title: on the toast setting the timer began to run super fast so that it would cut off long before ...
customer_reviews.text: After one week, on the toast setting the timer began to run super fast so that it would cut off long before the bread was toasted and then would give an error message. I've sent it back for a replacement, because I really like it otherwise. Hopefully, the second one will function reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster oven we've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toaster oven we've ever had. It's very intuitive to use, heats and toasts things to perfection, and looks great. Great size, too—not too big, not too small. And most important feature: it has a very pleasant dark screen with lighted figures and characters rather than a bright blue-white LCD screen that lights up the entire kitchen (we returned one because its screen was far too bright, the backlight didn't shut off for 10 full minutes after use, and it couldn't be shut off manually). It's very nice-looking, too. Everything about this oven is terrific. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this unit to replace a Black & Decker toaster ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit to replace a Black & Decker toaster oven which was 9 years old. The oven is slightly bigger than other toaster ovens, but the performance is equal to our high-end oven system. We've are able to use this unit rather than our larger ovens -- it heats up faster than our conventional ovens and maintains the same cooking quality. I'm impressed with the product design, quality of material, and the performance on everything from pizza to pork roast.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: i dont miss my old stove, but well maybe a little..
customer_reviews.text: doing fine, especially for toast and pretty good for cake, but tricky to add time on, if you dont add time before it goes off and cools a bit you have to have it preheat, then it dings so you have to press again to start, which means having to stand around and wait,,frustrating, and, your cake can fall in that amount of time. Also, my first and only bread was flat,,did something wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: Love the stainless steel look,durability,ease of use and performance of this oven. Like there are three shelves to select from and the bigger size is great much more than old toaster oven we had. The digital display is nice and large. Support from Kitchenaid is great also. When i called for a question i got someone right away.
customer_reviews.author: fish and dog man

customer_reviews.title: ... has a full stove but it made the apartment super hot when I cooked
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a small apartment that has a full stove but it made the apartment super hot when I cooked. Then the smoke alarm would go off because it was so hot. It was beyond annoying. So I decided to get this convection oven and I love it! I can actually cook without the smoke alarm going off. The food comes out tasty and it cooks faster.
customer_reviews.author: keri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through both Cuisinart and Breville toaster ovens with unsatisfactory results. I decided to give this a try. Although it isn't described as a toaster oven, it does have that function. So far I live this oven. It is compact and well made.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I used to think KitchenAid was a good brand.
customer_reviews.text: It's basically brand new and tonight while cooking eggplant slices the display stopped working and it doesn't cook anymore. I used to think KitchenAid was a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Arduser

customer_reviews.title: But I like the size and everything else about
customer_reviews.text: This is my first digital oven, so I am still a bit frustrated with the temperature and time setting. I have to keep selecting the numbers several times before I can get it to start. But I like the size and everything else about it
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your hard earned $$.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. After 11 months the selection dial is broken making it useless. My old $40 model lasted years. Don't waste your money. 4/7/16 Update: called KitchenAid customer service and they were very polite and friendly. After explaining my problem, they sent me a new convection oven and a prepaid shipping label to send back the broken oven..... so maybe I just got a lemon - we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, will recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this product. It is easy to use and I think it's pretty handy. I like being able to warm up frozen chicken nuggets without turning on the big oven or microwaving. I have baked a cake and made mini pizzas, and look forward to experimenting with many other foods. It doesn't take long at all to preheat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic countertop oven!  Perfect for an RV.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was needing! We live in an RV and it came equipped with a convection/microwave as our only oven source. Did not work well as an oven for many reasons, so I had been looking for something that would fit in our rig and be lightweight so I could move it around. This is perfect! Does not heat up the entire rig, doesn't draw many amps, bakes evenly and consistently, and is easy to use. Does not shut off every time you open the door. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: We like it lots!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this item. We were a little "whiney" and bemoaned the fact it doesn't have an interior light but we decided the in so small an area would be affected by a bulb and that was why they didn't include a light. Other than that small detail we have no other complaints and are really enjoying this addition to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Fran the Gran

customer_reviews.title: Great oven.
customer_reviews.text: This oven is awesome! It is like a small home oven. I have used it to bake cornbread, chicken, fish, garlic bread, etc. It works well for heating stuff that you don't want to use a microwave oven for. It will work well for anything that will fit in it! I like not having to heat up a large oven to bake stuff for two people. I like the quality and easy digital system to use. It heats up quickly and saves energy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife and she tells me often how much she loves her new oven. She says it is easy to operate and loves the look and usefulness of the large handle. Two things she would like: Light and accommodate a 9 X 13 pan.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The best toaster oven I've seen. It's eerie how accurate the built-in timer is when you toast something. Set the shade and number of slices, and darn if it's not almost exactly perfect when the timer beeps. Doubles as a mini oven substitute for everything I bake unless the pan is too large for it. Bakes 12" frozen pizzas perfectly. Only gripe is it doesn't have a light inside, so I end up using a flashlight to see how things are coming along without opening the door.
customer_reviews.author: mp6453

customer_reviews.title: This KitchenAid has changed the way we cook...
customer_reviews.text: This little oven has changed the way we heat up all of our food. There is no longer a need to fire up our large oven for a slice or pizza or to heat up leftovers. The KitchenAid looks great and is made of high quality components. I just wish it came with a second shelf so that we could cooks more items at once.
customer_reviews.author: MP from NY

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose oven!
customer_reviews.text: This oven replaced the one I wore out. Best investment I have ever made! We use this for everything that will fit in it. Great and quick for pizza! We love the convection feature and use it as often as possible. We love the toaster oven for garlic bread.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K Lemmer

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought this
customer_reviews.text: Glad we bought this product. Cooking for one or two is much easier. And does not heat up the house. Only complaint is lack of an interior light for oven. Rarely use wall oven.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I have made everything from steak to lasagna to pizza to simple toast with great results. Always turn on the fan for the ...
customer_reviews.text: As a company convenience oven or at home on the countertop, this convection oven provides a healthy alternative to the microwave. I have made everything from steak to lasagna to pizza to simple toast with great results. Always turn on the fan for the convection unless your baking method forbids this. I like how easy this oven is to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: thewebandi

customer_reviews.title: This one is clear has just what I need works great couldn't say nothing about
customer_reviews.text: This is really the toaster oven I've been looking for, there are so many that have a lot of options but they turn out to be hard to use and they're kind of confusing. This one is clear has just what I need works great couldn't say nothing about it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not suggest to buy
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for less than a year but one of the baking function is not working already. The heat won't work and it only stays at the per heated level. I would not recommend this product for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ttoomey

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for over a year and use it about 3 times a week, no problems so far. I use it mainly for pizza, croissants, and broiling. It heats up in about 4 minutes compared to 20 minutes for my range’s oven, and the digital timer is great. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Rymarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen appliance....
customer_reviews.text: The refurbished KitchenAid Convection is perfect - works perfect - looks great on the counter - priced right - and excellent delivery frame. I couldn't be more thrilled.....This has my highest recommendation. Thank you Amazon......
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Kauset

customer_reviews.title: I am an engineer and could not figure out this thing
customer_reviews.text: The setting are very strange. There is not a simple heating option. The pre-heat is a pain...soon will swap for something that you can simple set the temperature and run.
customer_reviews.author: E. hosseini

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's super easy to use. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: 2 8" loaf pans fit just fine. Tip - for quick breads
customer_reviews.text: This is so versatile... From reheating to baking seafood and poultry - it performs so well. I now use it to bake all of my quick bread recipes; 2 8" loaf pans fit just fine. Tip - for quick breads, be sure to use bottom rack otherwise the rising will burn on the top. Wall oven - mostly good bye. Interior is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: We had another toaster oven but it kept turning itself off. This one is so easy to use and it is very nice. Easy cleaning. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Looked around a lot, but I really love this thing. Good size, will use it a bunch to not heat the whole oven. Controls are easier than I thought they'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Love my toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: We use to have a Cuisinart convention oven which we loved and used often until it finally died. Began researching similiar items; small profile, convention, easy to use and found the KitchenAid. Great size and quality. Love the easy to remove crumb tray. Will be purchasing another for my mom whose current counter convection/bake oven takes forever to make toast and is not very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Fox

customer_reviews.title: This was the best discovery we made and we use the oven every ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best discovery we made and we use the oven every day!! It took so long for our old gas stove oven to heat that we decided to try the Kitchen Aid oven = brillant!! We bake, toast, broil, etc. and all results are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: First one showed up and the display didn't work so we had no way to control it. We called kitchenaid and they promptly sent a replacement. We are now very happy and this little oven is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Varga

customer_reviews.title: Broken- warranty doesn't cover. Sucks don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This oven is digital. It's starts up fine with pre heating but once it reaches the temp you set at it starts beeping with an error. We have tried calling amazon support and Kitchenaid but unfortunately received little help. Now this sits broken for having it less than 2 years
customer_reviews.author: SusanSF

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: Just great! Bakes, warms, broils evenly. Large interior will hold 12" pizza. However, it takes time to toast things so if you have a toaster, I would use that for regular bread.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews brought me to this unit and I’m glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace a Cuisinart that I had for years. Other reviews brought me to this unit and I’m glad I made the purchase. I have had the KitchenAid for about a month and it has worked perfectly. It heats quickly and cooks great. It’s a great size and easy to use. I have had absolutely no negative issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moorehead

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: I love it for one year, I bake pizza and use toaster then start having issues with preheat, stopping, and making noise but still work, today 1 year and 7 months stop working have error sign on screen and making a pitch noise. I so sad because no warranty after a year.
customer_reviews.author: E. Heider

customer_reviews.title: So Far It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through several cheaper toaster ovens in the past several years and wanted one which will last. No one can predict how long a product will actually last, but this one is very nice, works great so far and has the looks of a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull little oven.
customer_reviews.text: this oven is great for heating/cooking a large variety of sizes. It does not heat up the kitchen like the full sized oven, which is great in the summer. The start mechanism takes getting a little used to, but I am not knocking a star off for it. It heats quickly and evenly. I would not call it a toaster oven b/c it is much more versatile than that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary 7324

customer_reviews.title: My new found love.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have a brand new LG convetion double door oven/stove, this machine is my new baby. So simpe, so easy to use. Durable handle, sturdy knobs. Great glass window-many settings. Sleek stainless steel look. We put it to use immediately and made veggie samosas, meat pies, pizza. So glad I bought this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Joujou

customer_reviews.title: It's is very useful and the quality of this oven is beyond my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's is very useful and the quality of this oven is beyond my expectation. I've used it to bake, broil and heat up the baked goods. It's very easy to clean and the handle bar never gets hot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ching Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: As older consumers we both love the digital readout
customer_reviews.text: My new product impaired husband absolutely loves this oven. As older consumers we both love the digital readout. It cooks true to temperature & the timer works great. It does get hot; but, then our old oven that we replaced did too. Just the right size for a small family or empty nesters like us. I would recommend this oven to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love this small convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this small convection oven. We have it on our patio so we can use it during the hot summer months and it will not heat up the house.
customer_reviews.author: LinCockr

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a toaster oven before and holy cow! I use it more than my oven! It's super cute and is one of the smallest ones that can fit a FULL size pizza in it. We did research for a month before we bought this one! It's pricey but well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Keli Sue

customer_reviews.title: Favorite small appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent, I use the counter oven rather than heat up the large oven. Wonderful easy to use computer that accurately bakes, toasts and broils. I foil line the crumb tray and included pan to lessen cleaning chores. Wish I had purchased this oven years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea T

customer_reviews.title: Good oven, no light
customer_reviews.text: The oven has no light and is a bit of a pain to wait for the pre heat. Really nice oven other than those 2 issues. You never know how much h you need or want a light until you don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: RiggeR

customer_reviews.title: lovvvvve it
customer_reviews.text: so convenient and fast! heats quickly and cooks evenly. i keep the convection setting on for about everything! bake, toast, reheat—eat! getting another one because my mom borrowed it for the holiday and now i’m not getting it back, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Weak Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The toaster oven works fine but the pan came damaged. I called product support and requested a replacement pan. A month later, still no pan.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Controls and settings are a little confusing for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Controls and settings are a little confusing for my wife. But now she has the hang of it and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent appliance. We use ours all the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent appliance. We use ours all the time and have had it for almost a year. It heats up fast and saves us from having to use the larger oven, which in the summer time is great.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Gifts for yourself that don't have to be returned because it was the wrong color or size
customer_reviews.text: I just love it and I am still getting use to using it instead of the microwave. So much healthier way to cook and re-heat food. I highly recommend it to everyone. Same size as my microwave but does so much more. My gift to me for Christmas. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jMajor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it was a little bit bigger on the width side. Will only hold small pans.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Little

customer_reviews.title: Preheat control is poorly conceived
customer_reviews.text: We have used this oven for over two years. Generally a good product. The preheat control is silly. If you don’t hang around to push the start button after the oven preheats, it turns off. I can’t find a workaround.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, easy to use, looks great on the counter appealing yet sturdy design. KitchenAid delivers! You will "fire" your microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hands

customer_reviews.title: Best counter top oven on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is probable the best counter top oven on the market. I works great, has a preheat mode with and alert beep and controls temp well. We have had this for over a year. I would buy it again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: It bakes and toasts very well, however I haven't seen much improvement in time required when using the convection button. Nice size for small amounts. Haven't used the roast setting as yet. I really like the controls and the tray for crumbs etc. at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: kayinwyo

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and size. Love it except you have to turn it on to bake once it warms up or it turns off. A little confusing to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: I have had this oven for a few Months now and love it. I especially like the fact that you can use aluminum foil in it, which you can't in some of the cheaper versions.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Functions
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they found it to be easy and functional
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of it on my Kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it on my Kitchen counter. It serves all of my baking, toasting etc needs perfect. Excellent product. I would love to have a light inside but everything else is awsome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is working great. Just what I expected from KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.author: johnnie McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to replace an old convection oven. It works great, looks great, is a well made piece of kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love this Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: I had this oven more than 4 months it does everything I need it to do. From doing to toast to baking a meat loaf. very easy to clean up. I plan to buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: mas47

customer_reviews.title: 18 Months and Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over 18 months now. We use it to bake, broil and toast all sorts of things. Easy to clean and a snap to use. A worth while investment and a great companion to the big oven.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wagner

customer_reviews.title: This oven is great. the build quality is what you would expect ...
customer_reviews.text: This oven is great. the build quality is what you would expect from KitchenAid.we have cooked chicken as well as Pizza in the oven and the results were great. you won't be disappointed in this oven but In would wait for a lower price. we paid $210
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This review is from Mark From Indy's Wife...anything your oven can do, this can do but without all the heat. It's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mark From Indy

customer_reviews.title: Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Convection Oven and can bake almost anything. A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu

customer_reviews.title: Love this countertop oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this countertop oven. I am able to cook anything that a full size oven.. I did order the second shelf and this helps tremendously for when space is need for more than one item.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Lu

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old Kitchenaid
customer_reviews.text: Better than my old Kitchenaid, only flaw is I wish LED readout would also show mode like bagel,bake, toast etc lit up so I don't have to read print around knob. But excellent unit.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Nice convection oven.  We are pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Sexy-rexy convection oven. My wife's Christmas present which I love. She's keen on it too. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rich DavisTop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used KitchenAid. I toast , warm up, bake in it. Everything always comes out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with our new countertop oven
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our new countertop oven! Very well designed, efficient, easy to clean and operate...I read reviews and am so thankful for the feedback. Hopefully this will be helpful to someone also!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this oven works just like it says...GREAT. preheat is fabulous. controls easier to use i would recommend
customer_reviews.author: steph's

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a while and it is used everyday. We have had no issues. It replaced a cheaper toaster oven that lasted about a year. Great oven and worth the extra money compared to a low end oven.
customer_reviews.author: Beta152

customer_reviews.title: So far is excellent at everything from toast to main dinner courses
customer_reviews.text: So far is excellent at everything from toast to main dinner courses, and the quality of KitchenAid has continued for years.
customer_reviews.author: nboy

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a toaster/oven
customer_reviews.text: So far have only used the toaster feature, but will try other features, soon as I work up the nerve. It does make good toast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression only.
customer_reviews.text: New and just o ut of the box impressions: Well built and good quality inside and out. The removable front tray placement is an excellent feature. It is very easy to program and use compared to others I have had in the past. The convection fan is very quiet. I will give a follow up and more in depth review after a year or so of use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nony Mause

customer_reviews.title: The toasting function isn't even (burns in the back, ...
customer_reviews.text: The toasting function isn't even (burns in the back, no color in the front), but otherwise it's a decent oven.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: We like it however
customer_reviews.text: We like it however, it should have one more shelve. We will try and continue looking for one with 3 shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Howe

customer_reviews.title: Really good oven
customer_reviews.text: Really like this oven so far. Very easy to use. Nice size and everything came out as good as a big conventional oven. Much easier to use and warms up a lot faster than a big oven.
customer_reviews.author: EP New York

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Kitchen Aid Convection Oven. Kitchen Aid always puts out a great product.

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen since we decided to get rid of microwave pollution. Miss my microwave clock and timer though!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish better insulated so you didn't have to have the 4 inch clearance all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it for his new loft that doesn't have a stove. Very affordable and it cleans easily too

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I use instead of using my oven
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I use instead of using my oven. It preheats quickly and is easy to keep clean.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good! Seems to be quality product
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a month.. so far so good! Seems to be quality product!

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KCO273SS 12" Convection Bake Digital Countertop Oven - Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Enjoy full-size oven performance on your kitchen counter with the KitchenAid® 12" Convection Countertop Oven. Nine memory settings for exceptional cooking results, including Asado Roast that adjusts temperature for superior roasting performance and Pizza to deliver optimal crisping of crust.

BRAND STORY
By KitchenAid
feature_bullets: Even-heat technology provides consistent heat throughout baking cycle for delicious results.
Use your countertop oven to bake pizza, broil a side dish, keep an already cooked dish warm or toast bread.
9 pre-programmed functions such as the Asado Roast Function to precisely adjust from high sear to optimal cooking temperature for superior roasting.
120-minute timer can be set to remind you when a dish is finished and offers plenty of time for the requirements of most recipes. Power Cord Length - 2-9/10
Offers enough room to cook 2-12" pizzas, or cornish hens. The oven cavity also features a non-stick coating for easy cleaning.
Includes 12" non-stick multipurpose pan, 12" broiling rack, cooling rack, non-stick drip tray.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars472 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
